title: PM has sent advice to President to dissolve NA: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 03 (APP): Minister for Information & Broadcasting and Law & Justice Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Sunday said Prime Minister Imran Khan had sent an advice to President Arif Alvi to dissolve the National Assembly under Article 58 of the Constitution.
This he announced in a post on his twitter handle.
وزیر اعظم نے آئین کے آرٹیکل 58 کے تحت صدر مملکت کو قومی اسمبلی تحلیل کرنے کی ایڈوائس بھیج دی ہے
